mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rev. Peter Robert Vest Cemetery, Little River Dist.
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
This Cemetery is very overgrown which has made a full survey very difficult. It is located opposite the driveway of 536 Wild Cherry Rd. NE. It is About 130 Yards into the woods. It requires parking at the road and walking to the site. Another survey is planned during the winter months when the site will be more accessible. Special note: It has been observed on Findagrave.com burials in this cemetery have been inadvertently placed in the Samuel L. Vest Cemetery
N 37 02.297' W 80 16.595'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
